2011300.name: Cidade Alta
2011300.description:
Cidade Alta is a ROLEPLAY game, where players can create their characters and create their stories.

Metaverse

Players are part of our metaverse directed to the RolePlay community, a game genre that consists of creating and/or interpreting characters, members of our metaverse form an organic community through interactions between players.

Learn more

The Metaverse of Cidade Alta is a living world full of opportunities within the game, which offers a modern scenario for players, allowing the interpretation of characters who can choose completely opposite paths to those they follow in their lives, being policemen, doctors, mechanics and even bandits, creating an ecosystem full of surprises and news with each new step taken within the Cidade Alta, within the metaverse you can be whoever you want, do what you want, you are the owner of your own story!
